function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shift in tourist demand from international to domestic markets due to pandemic, leading to potential revenue losses for PCAs.","Impact":"Potential substantial negative effects on PCA revenues and losses due to pandemic, unless strategies and promotion are adjusted.","Mitigation":"Develop new marketing strategies to attract domestic tourists, and adjust facilities to cater to domestic market.","Technologies":"Online marketing and promotion tools to target domestic tourists, facility management tools to adjust amenities for domestic market.","People":"Managers of PCAs, tourism industry professionals","Owner":"Managers of PCAs, tourism industry professionals"},{"Description":"Reduction in domestic public budgets, leading to potential reallocation of funds away from PCAs.","Impact":"Pressure on public sector budgets may result in reduced funding for PCAs, as seen in past economic recessions.","Mitigation":"Advocate for the importance of PCAs in public budgets, lobby for continued funding for conservation efforts.","Technologies":"Advocacy platforms, lobbying tools, budget management software for public sector.","People":"Conservation advocates, policymakers, government officials","Owner":"Conservation advocates, policymakers, government officials"},{"Description":"Reduction in official development aid and philanthropy for PCAs due to economic recession and fiscal constraints in donor countries.","Impact":"Decline in aid and philanthropic donations for PCAs, potentially affecting conservation efforts and projects.","Mitigation":"Promote the importance of PCAs in aid and philanthropy, seek alternative sources of funding, diversify fundraising efforts.","Technologies":"Fundraising platforms, online advocacy tools, donor management software.","People":"Conservation organizations, fundraising professionals, philanthropic organizations","Owner":"Conservation organizations, fundraising professionals, philanthropic organizations"}]}
